author: johnh
msg: Stub: Add ability to @Inject a JsCompiler that performs runtime JS compilation on served code.
This does not actually implement the compiler as yet, due to JRE version issues. Specifically, Closure Compiler appears to demand 1.6 yet Shindig is still on 1.5.
